trans-unit.source: Represents a connector between two activity designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 表示工作流程設計介面上的兩個活動設計工具之間的連接器。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A connector is the line that appears on a workflow design surface that connects one activity designer to another.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]接點就是連接到另一個活動設計工具工作流程設計介面顯示的線條。

trans-unit.source: Connector provides methods and properties that allow you to customize how to draw a set of connectors when an activity designer is rendered at design time.
trans-unit.target: 連接器會提供方法和屬性可讓您自訂在設計階段呈現活動設計工具時繪製一組接點的方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>其中繪製<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>開始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>其中繪製<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>結束。

trans-unit.source: source or target contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: source或target包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>協助工具應用程式使用來調整殘障使用者應用程式的 UI。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that accessibility applications use to adjust the application UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref>協助工具應用程式使用來調整殘障使用者應用程式的 UI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the connector on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程設計介面上的接點週框矩形。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the connector on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>工作流程設計介面上包圍接點。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>修改。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the connector is modified; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果接點已修改;否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of points that contains all segments found in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得唯讀狀態點的集合，其中包含所有區段中找到<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> read-only collection that contains all segments found in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>唯讀集合，其中包含所有區段中找到<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> is equal to the specified connector.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否目前<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>是否等於指定的接點。

trans-unit.source: Equals verifies that both the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> properties of the two connectors hold references to the same <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 等驗證同時<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A>和<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A>的兩個連接器的屬性可保存相同的參考<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint>物件。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Target%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> to compare with the current connector.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>要與目前接點比較。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified connector is equal to the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的接點和目前相等<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an empty array of Rectangle object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回矩形物件的空陣列。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes populate this collection.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別會填入這個集合。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection of Rectangle objects.
trans-unit.target: 矩形物件的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的雜湊碼<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a service object of the specified type if it is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的話，則傳回指定之型別的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: GetService returns the service object available through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: GetService 傳回服務物件可透過<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the service object to return.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>要傳回之服務物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務物件 serviceType 則為 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中) 型別的服務物件是否 serviceType 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified point resides on the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的點是否位在目前<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Typically, HitTest indicates whether a user has clicked a point on a connector displayed on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 通常，HitTest 表示使用者已按下工作流程設計介面上顯示之接點上的點。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to test.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>測試。

trans-unit.source: if point resides on the current ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if point resides on the current ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Invalidates the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> and causes it to be redrawn.
trans-unit.target: 使目前<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>並使它重新繪製。

trans-unit.source: Invalidate causes all contents found in <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A> to be included in the update region for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 使原因中<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A>要包含在<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ParentDesigner%2A>的更新區域中</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.Bounds%2A>找到的所有內容

trans-unit.source: Changes the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> height and width using the settings defined in the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 變更<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>高度和寬度，使用定義在指定的設定<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the height and width settings to offset the connector.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> ，其中包含要位移接點的高度和寬度設定。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> that layout operations are occurring.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>正在發生配置作業。

trans-unit.source: OnLayout clears <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A> and repopulates it with a new range of points.
trans-unit.target: 清除 OnLayout<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A>並重新填入新的點範圍。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.ConnectorSegments%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 呈現<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>工作流程設計介面上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the drawing data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref>包含繪製資料。

trans-unit.source: Used for drawing the Connector when it is dragged from one state to another.
trans-unit.target: 用於繪製連接器，當從一狀態拖曳到另一個。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a user is creating a connector, moving a middle point or moving an endpoint from one activity to another.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者建立接點、 移動中心點或端點移動到另一個活動時，會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref>物件，指定用來繪製物件，並在其中繪製的裁剪方框的圖形。

trans-unit.source: Coordinates for the segments in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 區段中的座標<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Coordinated for the edit points on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 上編輯點的座標<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Used for drawing a Connector that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 用於繪製連接器所選取的使用者。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> object that specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref>物件，指定用來繪製物件，並在其中繪製的裁剪方框的圖形。

trans-unit.source: Not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用。

trans-unit.source: Coordinates for the edit points on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 上編輯點的座標<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer on which the connecter appears on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計工具，接點會顯示在工作流程設計介面上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the connector appears on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.FreeformActivityDesigner"> </xref>連接器出現在工作流程設計介面上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the workflow view associated with the connector.
trans-unit.target: 取得與接點關聯的工作流程檢視。

trans-unit.source: ParentView provides access to the workflow design surface on which the connector appears.
trans-unit.target: ParentView 提供存取權，接點會顯示工作流程設計介面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"></xref> that is associated with the connector.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView"> </xref>與連接器相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 執行配置工作<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: PerformLayout calls the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and specifies that the layout update does not need to occur immediately.
trans-unit.target: PerformLayout 呼叫<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，並指定配置更新不需要立即發生。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowView.PerformLayout%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Reroutes the connector from source to target if the connector has changed.
trans-unit.target: 排列連接線從來源到目標如果接點發生變更。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> collection that represents the new connector segments to use for rerouting.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>集合，代表要用於重設路徑的新接點區段。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>其中的繪圖<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>開始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> begins.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>其中的繪圖<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>開始。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property the source <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*> does not match the target associated designer.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性的來源<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>與目標相關聯的設計工具不相符。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>

trans-unit.source: Source was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 來源已設定為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的資源全部釋出<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref>其中的繪圖<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>結束。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"></xref> where drawing of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref> ends.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint"> </xref>其中的繪圖<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector"></xref>結束。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property the source <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*> does not match the target associated designer.
trans-unit.target: 當設定這個屬性的來源<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>與目標相關聯的設計工具不相符。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.AssociatedDesigner*>

trans-unit.source: Target was set to a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 目標設定為 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。
